snippet: Maserati executives emphasized the Italian pedigree of its eventual ultraluxury S.U.V., which would be assembled in Michigan at the same plant that builds the Jeep Grand Cherokee.
abstract: Maserati executives emphasized the Italian pedigree of its eventual ultraluxury S.U.V., which would be assembled in Michigan at the same plant that builds the Jeep Grand Cherokee.
lead_paragraph: Shown Tuesday, Jan. 10: Maserati Kubang concept.

headline.main: Maserati Kubang Concept: Made in America, but Mum's the Word
